divs: Sighting DetailsNear Jeremiah, KentuckyI was outside with my grandmother, both of us were inclined to look south, atthe sky. The object was so bright and colorful I did not have an initialreaction. As the object got closer all I could think was how the object lit uplike a Christmas tree. I was unable to move or take my eyes away from theobject. The object passed over us and stationed itself atop a mountain. Mygrandmother made me go inside, so I have no idea how much longer the objectremained atop the mountain. The object was disc shaped with solid coloredbrilliant bright lights. The lights were connected next to each other forming acomplete circle around the disc.
Summary: I saw circular disk of with different colored lig
